text: ==Events== * A financial crisis hit Rome. Many aristocratic families suffered losses. * Saint Peter became the first Pope in history. * Tiberius founded a credit bank in Rome * Traditionally, Christianity was founded * Traditional date for Crucifixion, Resurrection and Ascension of Jesus, though 28 and 30 are also suggested as a date for these events. == Births == * Gaius Rubellius Plautus, son of Gaius Rubellius Blandus and Julia. ==Deaths== * Agrippina the Elder, wife of Germanicus * Drusus Caesar, son of Germanicus and Agrippina the Elder * Gaius Asinius Gallus, widower of Vipsania Agrippina and potential lover of Agrippina the elder * Marcus Aemilius Lepidus, senator * Nero Caesar, son of Germanicus and Agrippina the Elder Category:30s Category:Christianity
